name: Hot Chili Chocolate Cake
description: The richness of the chocolate and chili combination is an ideal finish to a Mexican feast.
preparation: Preheat oven to 350° F (175° C). Lightly spray a 9 x 13” pan with vegetable oil.
Whisk together flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, baking powder, crushed chilies and salt into mixing bowl.
Add eggs, oil, coffee, buttermilk and vanilla extract. Beat with an electric mixer at medium speed for 2 minutes. Pour batter into prepared pan.
Bake for 40 minutes or until toothpick inserted in centre of cake comes out clean.
tips: Dust cake with cocoa, and for an extra touch, decorate with a couple of fresh chilies to let people know they are in for a special treat.
